text: @Yamiche @DrDinD More than 80% of the benefits of a tax change in the coronavirus relief package passed last month will go to those who earn more than $1 million annually, provision inserted into the legislation by disgusting @SenateGOP will cost taxpayers about $90 billion in 2020 (WP)
